short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View history reports of vehicles off of VIN.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Overview 📋

Welcome to AttakerVIN! This Chrome extension is designed to revolutionize the way you access vehicle history reports using VINs (Vehicle Identification Numbers). With AttakerVIN, you can instantly view comprehensive history reports from trusted sources such as Experian and Carfax. This extension simplifies your vehicle research process, ensuring you make informed decisions every time. Whether you're buying, selling, or simply curious about a vehicle's past, AttakerVIN is your go-to tool.

---

Key Features 🌟

- Instant History Reports 📄: Quickly generate and view detailed history reports by simply entering the VIN. Access reports from reputable sources like Experian and Carfax with just one click.
- Seamless Integration 🌐: The extension integrates smoothly with any web page, highlighting VINs automatically. Offers a context menu option to get history reports directly from highlighted VINs.
- User-Friendly Interface 🎨: Intuitive and easy-to-navigate popup design. Clearly labeled tabs for main functions, settings, and instructions.
- Customization Options 🛠️: Save user-specific settings for a personalized experience. Option to replace existing report buttons on web pages with custom ones.
- Secure and Private 🔒: Your settings and preferences are securely stored using Chrome's storage. Ensures that your data remains private and only accessible to you.

---

How to Use 🚀

1. Generate a Report Link 🔗: Enter the VIN in the input box within the extension popup. Click on "Generate Link" to create a custom report link. Copy the generated link using the "Copy Link" button for easy sharing.
2. View Reports from Highlighted VINs 🖱️: Highlight any VIN on a webpage, and the extension will display a popup with options to view reports. Click on the highlighted VIN or use the context menu to access history reports.
3. Customize Your Experience ⚙️: Go to the "Settings" tab in the popup to enter your user name and adjust preferences. Save your settings to ensure a tailored experience every time you use the extension.

---

Installation Instructions 🛠️

1. Download and Install 📥: Install the AttakerVIN extension from the Chrome Web Store. Ensure the extension is enabled in your Chrome browser settings.
2. Set Up Your Preferences 📝: Open the extension by clicking the AttakerVIN icon in the Chrome toolbar. Navigate to the "Settings" tab and enter your user information and preferences. Save your settings to start using the extension effectively.
3. Start Using AttakerVIN 🌟: Enter any VIN in the popup or highlight VINs on web pages to get instant history reports. Use the context menu option for quick access to reports without opening the popup.

---

Support and Feedback 📞

We value your feedback and are here to assist you with any questions or issues. Please contact our support team at support@transparencymotors.com for assistance.
